title: New: Boniface – Phantom Limbs
content:
I’m a sucker for over-the-top stadium leaning-pop done right; we’re talking Sam’s Town era The Killers here, and Morning Runner – hey remember them?

Winnipeg’s Boniface already showed on his debut single, I Will Not Return As A Tourist, that he has a knack for finding those unashamedly brilliant hooks, and his follow-up, Phantom Limbs is undoubtedly just that, brilliant, sure to inspire the sort of air punching that Springsteen dreams of.

Check it out below.

And don’t come running to the city when I fall / Cause I’m nothing if there’s nothing here at all
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
